articles.title: Pele's family gather at hospital bedside in Sau Paulo - Rediff.com
articles.description: Brazilian soccer legend Pele's family members gathered at the Albert Einstein hospital in Sao Paulo on Saturday, where the 82-year-old, widely considered one of the greatest footballers of all time, has been since late November.
articles.content:

articles.title: Lionel Messi Offered $1 Million For The Bisht He Wore While Lifting FIFA World Cup Trophy - NDTV
articles.description: Mr Barwani stated that the World Cup meant a lot to Arab nations and the bisht is a symbol of wisdom, bravery, integrity, generosity and authenticity.
articles.content:
Bisht is a traditional men's cloak popular in the Arab countries.
Argentina captain Lionel Messi was seen wearing an Arabic black robe or 'bisht' as a mark of honour when he lifted the World Cup tro… [+1970 chars]
